Lamia

Lamia smiled devilish while she heard the explanation of Maurader an=
d imagine the great era for Unicron and his children.



From: Preston Carr=
oll 
Sent: Tuesday, March 23, 2010 3:22 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subj=
ect: Re: Rebuilding the minions!


  
(OOC: And so we begin!!)

As Lamia fo=
llowed Marauder down the large hall, the light slowly got
brighter as they =
walked, although it never really became more than a
haze of crimson. Enough=
 to see by, but not truly bright by any
standards.

Finally the hall opened=
 into a giant chasm, easily 100 meters across.
However it's width that gave=
 its size, it was its depth.

"This was once a great thermal vent dear Lami=
a, but it has been put to
better uses." Marauder spoke, his voice betraying=
 a bit of pride and
accomplishment. "There was a time when volcanic rock po=
ured through
this very channel that we walked, flowing out onto the surface=
 of the
ground. But now its power is banked and curbed and channeled to our=

own uses." Maurader laughed.

"Sir." came a voice out of the crimson gloom=
 from up ahead. "It is
good to see you have returned. All is nearly in read=
iness."

As the voice spoke a figure stepped out of the shadows, obviously
=
having come from somewhere further in the chasm. His armored chassis
was pr=
edominantly purple and black, although it was difficult to make
out the hue=
 in the strange redness of the area. A large insectile head
made up the fig=
ure's broad and powerful chest while insect-like wings
were folded down his=
 back, giving him a regal, almost kingly visage.

"You have done well!" Mar=
auder said as he looked approvingly upon the figure.

The figure nodded, a =
slight smile appearing on his face, and then he
turned his head as his opti=
cs fell on Lamia. He looked at her
curiously as he steped further into the =
light. He was not overly tall,
but although he was deferential to Marauder,=
 there was still something
about him that was commanding as more of his for=
m was revealed.

"Ahh yes." Marauder said magnanimously, "Where are my mann=
ers?" he
smiled as he stepped back slightly, "Lamia, meet Dirge, my second =
in
command here. " Maruader gestured at Lamia, "Dirge meet Lamia, she is
an=
other of the Minions to have found her way back home."

Maruader nodded as =
he looked at both of them in satisfaction,
"Together, with the legions we a=
re ready to build, we will bring this
planet to its knees! and will serve t=
he might of UNICRON" Mauraduer
laughed evilly, "BWHAHAHAHA!!"

(TAG)

Prest=
on

OOC: I will be putting up a profile soon :)
